title: Environmental Permitting Amendments
general_provisions: This bill creates a program for the expedited review of environmental permit applications.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>authorizes the Department of Environmental Quality (department) and Division of Oil, Gas, and Mining (division) to make rules to:<hr><ltbullet1>identify a permit administered by the department or division as a permit eligible for expedited review;<hr><ltbullet1>establish requirements for the expedited review process;<hr><ltbullet1>certify a qualified reviewer;<hr><ltbullet1>authorize a qualified reviewer to complete an expedited review of an eligible permit; and<hr><ltbullet1>establish the maximum number of a days for a qualified reviewer to complete an expedited review;<hr><ltbullet>requires the department and division to conduct a technical review and make a final administrative decision for a permit application upon completion of an expedited review; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes.
last_action: House/ received bill from Legislative Research

action_history.description: House/ received bill from Legislative Research
